about_the_game:
Mugen RPG is a top-down game

Machine guns, submachine guns, rockets, laser cannons - the firepower of modern technology is interwoven; bloodlines, magic, the Sage's Stone, ancient artifacts - mysterious and ancient power shines.

Step into different worlds, fight countless enemies, and experience a journey of growth like never before! Escape from the siege of slimes, survive the onslaught of orcs, and face the legendary dragon head-on.

Continue to evolve and strengthen yourself in battle, and move towards new limits.

Game Features

  • Multiple power systems, build exclusive roles

    From mechanical technology to ancient magic, from a variety of professions to mysterious bloodlines, free to collocate, flexible construction, to create a unique fighting style! Experience the collision of different systems and discover your perfect combination.

  • Weapons automatically attack, focus on battle strategy

    Equipped weapons will automatically lock the enemy to attack, without manual operation, so you can devote yourself to dodge, positioning and tactical layout, challenge all kinds of enemies, and hit the limit of operation!

  • Random world, unknown challenges

    Every time you enter a new adventure, you will face familiar but changing challenges. Weapons, equipment and props randomly obtained from the store add unique strategies and uncertainties to each adventure. Adapt to new combinations, defeat each wave of enemies, and experience the fun of infinitely changing battles!
